channel.title: [Need Help] Client/Cache sided : Magic Book
channel.description:
Hello everyone.
I've been looking for a while any tutorials on "how to set my teleport spells to active" in the magic book Actually, I only have "Home" active, and I want to add all the other teleports to be able to view them easily.
Here's a picture of my Magic Book : http://prntscr.com/495nj2
I have used Tom's Suite to edit the cache, once I opened View/Edit Images Archives, I went to Media and search for magicoff & magicoff2 and I did change the "off" teleport pictures to "on" teleport pictures. I did "save archive" after all done. And no changes when I open up my client.
What I want is that : http://prntscr.com/496491 a picture took from deathlypvpz v4 client.
Anyone can help please ?
I have also Skype, if you are able to help me, add me : yanick.boulanger

item.title: [Need Help] Client/Cache sided : Magic Book
item.dc:creator: @Webster90 Webster90
item.description:
@Webster90 wrote:

I did it already and it doesn’t work. they are still “off” …

Read full topic

item.title: [Need Help] Client/Cache sided : Magic Book
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Most people just open the cache in toms cache editor, dump the magic on icons, and replace the magic off icons with the magic on.

Read full topic
